name: Ramen Noodle Frittata
author: Judy M
summary: Ramen noodles are baked into a frittata and topped with shredded cheese. My kids love this frittata for lunch!  It's so easy to make!
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages chicken flavored ramen noodles
directions: Place noodles in a saucepan filled with boiling water, reserving the seasoning packet
In a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs and seasoning packets from the noodles
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Add the noodle mixture, and cook over medium-low heat until firm, 5 to 7 minutes
Cut into fourths, and turn over to brown the other side for 1 to 2 minutes
Sprinkle cheese over the top, and serve
